logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Started update covid case flow", payload: #[payload]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java --- { case_id: vars.inputPayload.caseID, source: vars.inputPayload.source, case_type: vars.inputPayload.caseType, first_name: vars.inputPayload.firstName, last_name: vars.inputPayload.lastName, phone: vars.inputPayload.phone, email: vars.inputPayload.email, date_of_birth: vars.inputPayload.dateOfBirth as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd" }, national_id: vars.inputPayload.nationalID, national_id_type: vars.inputPayload.nationalIDType, street_address: vars.inputPayload.address.streetAddress, city: vars.inputPayload.address.city, state: upper(vars.inputPayload.address.state), postal: vars.inputPayload.address.postal, country: vars.inputPayload.address.country, update_date: now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd" }, create_by: "UHIS", update_by: "UHIS" }

db:update.doc:name: Update Covid Case Master
db:update.db:sql: update cvd_case_master set source=:source, case_type=:case_type, first_name=:first_name, last_name=:last_name, phone=:phone, email=:email, date_of_birth=TO_DATE(:date_of_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), national_id=:national_id, national_id_type=:national_id_type, street_address=:street_address, city=:city, state=:state, postal=:postal, country=:country, update_date=TO_DATE(:update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), create_by=:create_by, update_by=:update_by where case_id=:case_id

logger.doc:name: End Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationID: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Completed update covid cases flow", payload: #[payload]
